definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: State-run enterprises are often criticized as being inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 國營企業經常被批評沒有效率。

sentences.english: The paper also probes profitably the problem of vivifying the state enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 對如何搞活國營企業的問題作了有益的探討。

sentences.english: It is a state-run enterprise set up in 1956.
sentences.chinese: 陽市醬油廠是1956年公私合營時組建的國營企業。

sentences.english: The People's Insurance Company of China is a state-owned enterprise enjoying high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民保險公司是一家享不很高聲譽的國營企業。

sentences.english: The circulating fund of state-owned enterprises is regulated by the central bank.
sentences.chinese: 國營企業流動資金由人民銀行統一管理。

sentences.english: The government is speeding up the reform in state-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 政府正加速國營企業的改革。

sentences.english: So state enterprises were forced to borrow.
sentences.chinese: 因此，國營企業被迫借貸。

sentences.english: The people's insurance company of china is a state-owned enterprise enjoying high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民保險公司是一家享有很高聲譽的國營企業。

definition: Xinhui district of Jiangmen city 江門市|江门市, Guangdong
to play yabao (a gambling game)/(fig.) to gamble on/to take one's chance/to try one's luck
